AgeRangeEnum.description: Enum to capture the age range that an Indiviudal belongs to.
AgeRangeEnum.title: AgeRangeEnum

Analysis.description: An Analysis is a data transformation that transforms input data to output data.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

description.description: A description summarizing how this Analysis was carried out (e.g., computational tools, pipelines, workflows).

reference_chromosome.description: The reference chromosome used for this Analysis.

reference_genome.description: The reference genome or annotation used for prior analyses (e.g., GRCh38.p13).

title.description: The title that describes an entity.

Analysis.title: Analysis

AnalysisProcess.description: An Analysis Process captures the workflow steps that were performed to analyze data obtained from a Sequencing Experiment.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

analysis.description: The Analysis that this Analysis Process is part of.

sample_input_files.description: The associated Sample File used as an input for this Analysis Process.

sequencing_process_input_files.description: The associated Sequencing Process File used as an input for this Analysis Process.

study_input_files.description: The associated Study File used as an input for this Analysis Process.

AnalysisProcess.title: AnalysisProcess

AnalysisProcessOutputFile.description: A Analysis Process OutputFile is a File that is associated as an output file with an Analysis Process.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

analysis_process.description: The Analysis Process this Analysis Process Output File is associated with.

checksum_type.description: The type of algorithm used to generate the checksum of the File.

dataset.description: The Dataset associated with this File.

format.description: The format of the File (e.g., BAM, SAM, CRAM, BAI).

forward_or_reverse.description: Denotes whether a submitted FASTQ file contains forward (R1) or reverse (R2) reads for paired-end sequencing.

size.description: The size of the File in bytes.

AnalysisProcessOutputFile.title: AnalysisProcessOutputFile

Attribute.description: A key/value pair that further characterizes an entity.

key_type.description: A semantic type that characterizes the attribute key (e.g., oxygen saturation measurement (MAXO:0000616)).

value.description: The value for an attribute (e.g., a numerical value without the units).

value_type.description: The value_type that characterizes the attribute value (e.g., percentage (SIO:001413)).

Attribute.title: Attribute

Biospecimen.description: A Biospecimen is any natural material taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostics, treatment, or research purposes.  It is linked to the Individual from which the Biospecimen is derived.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

description.description: A concise description about the Biospecimen source, the collection method, and the protocol which was followed to process this Biospecimen.

individual.description: The Individual entity from which this Biospecimen was derived.

isolation.description: Method or device employed for collecting/isolating this Biospecimen.

name.description: A descriptive name of this Biospecimen (e.g., GHGAB_caudate_nucleus_biospecimen). This property must not include any personally identifiable data.

storage.description: Methods by which this Biospecimen is stored.

tissue.description: The tissue this Biospecimen originated from.

vital_status_at_sampling.description: Vital Status of the Individual at the point of sampling (e.g., alive).

Biospecimen.title: Biospecimen

CaseControlStatusEnum.description: Enum to capture whether a condition corresponds to a case or a control condition.
CaseControlStatusEnum.title: CaseControlStatusEnum

Condition.description: A Condition specifies which special characteristics and treatments apply to a Sample (e.g., whether the Sample comes from a disease or a healthy tissue).

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

attributes.description: Key/value pairs corresponding to an entity.

case_control_status.description: Whether a Condition corresponds to a treatment or a control.

description.description: A concise description of the applied Condition.

disease_or_healthy.description: Whether a Condition corresponds to a disease or a healthy state.

mutant_or_wildtype.description: Whether a Condition corresponds to a mutant or a wildtype.

study.description: The Study associated with this Condition.

Condition.title: Condition

DataAccessCommittee.description: A group of members that are delegated to grant access to one or more datasets after ensuring the criteria for data sharing has been met,  and request for data use does not raise ethical and/or legal concerns.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

email.description: The email of the Data Access Committee (e.g., DAC[at]email.com). This property must not include any personally identifiable data.

institute.description: The Institute a person is affiliated with.

DataAccessCommittee.title: DataAccessCommittee

DataAccessPolicy.description: A Data Access Policy specifies under which circumstances, legal or otherwise, a user can have access to one or more Datasets belonging to one or more Studies.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

data_access_committee.description: The Data Access Committee linked to this Data Use Policy.

data_use_modifiers.description: One or more Data Use Modifiers for the Data Use Permission associated with this Data Use Policy. The used terms should be descendants of 'DUO:0000017: data use modifier'. Please use 'user specific restriction' if no other modifier applies.

data_use_permission.description: The Data Use Permission associated with this Data Use Policy. The used term should be a descendant of 'DUO:0000001: data use permission'.

description.description: A short description for this Data Access Policy.

name.description: A name for this Data Access Policy.

policy_text.description: The complete text for the Data Access Policy.

policy_url.description: An alternative to the Data Access Policy text is to provide the URL for the policy. This is useful if the terms of the policy are available online at a resolvable URL.

DataAccessPolicy.title: DataAccessPolicy

DataUseModifierEnum.description: Permitted values for data use modifier
enum: not for profit, non commercial use only
not for profit organisation use only
population origins or ancestry research prohibited
DataUseModifierEnum.title: DataUseModifierEnum

DataUsePermissionEnum.description: Permitted values for data use permission
enum: health or medical or biomedical research
population origins or ancestry research only
DataUsePermissionEnum.title: DataUsePermissionEnum

Dataset.description: A Dataset is a collection of Files that is prepared for distribution and is tied to a Data Access Policy.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

data_access_policy.description: The Data Access Policy that applies to this Dataset.

Dataset.title: Dataset

DiseaseOrHealthyEnum.description: Enum to capture whether a condition corresponds to a disease or a healthy state.
DiseaseOrHealthyEnum.title: DiseaseOrHealthyEnum

File.description: A file is an object that contains information generated from a process, either an Experiment or an Analysis.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

checksum_type.description: The type of algorithm used to generate the checksum of the File.

dataset.description: The Dataset associated with this File.

format.description: The format of the File (e.g., BAM, SAM, CRAM, BAI).

forward_or_reverse.description: Denotes whether a submitted FASTQ file contains forward (R1) or reverse (R2) reads for paired-end sequencing.

size.description: The size of the File in bytes.

File.title: File

FlowCellTypeEnum.description: Permitted values for flow cell type
FlowCellTypeEnum.title: FlowCellTypeEnum

ForwardOrReverseEnum.description: Enum to capture whether the reads from paired-end sequencing are forward (R1) or reverse (R2).
ForwardOrReverseEnum.title: ForwardOrReverseEnum

IndexReadEnum.description: Permitted Values to indicate the location of a sequence component in a read or index
IndexReadEnum.title: IndexReadEnum

Individual.description: An Individual is a Person who is participating in a Study.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

ancestries.description: A person's descent or lineage from a population.

geographical_region.description: The geographical region where the Individual is located.

phenotypic_features.description: The phenotypic feature concepts that the entity is associated with at the time of retrieval from the organism. The Phenotypic Feature is captured using a concept from the Human Phenotype Ontology.

sex.description: The genotypic sex of the Individual (e.g., female).

Individual.title: Individual

IndividualSexEnum.description: The sex of an Individual as as defined in a specific medical and clinical context.
IndividualSexEnum.title: IndividualSexEnum

InstrumentModelEnum.description: Permitted values for the instrument model
InstrumentModelEnum.title: InstrumentModelEnum

LibraryPreparationKitRetailNameEnum.description: Permitted values for library preparation kit retail name
LibraryPreparationKitRetailNameEnum.title: LibraryPreparationKitRetailNameEnum

LibraryPreparationProtocol.description: The Library Preparation Protocol captures information about the library preparation of a Sequencing Experiment.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

attributes.description: One or more attributes that further characterize this Library Preparation Protocol.

description.description: Description summarizing how a sequencing library was prepared.

end_bias.description: The end of the cDNA molecule that is preferentially sequenced (e.g., 3/5 prime end, full-length).

library_layout.description: Describe whether the library was sequenced in single-end (forward or reverse) or paired-end mode.

library_name.description: A short name identifying the library. The same name may refer to multiple versions of the same continually updated library.

library_preparation.description: The general method for preparation of the sequencing library (e.g., KAPA PCR-free).

library_preparation_kit_manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of the kit used for library preparation.

library_preparation_kit_retail_name.description: The retail name for the kit used to construct a genomic library. This may include the vendor name, kit name and kit version (e.g., Agilent sure select Human Exome V8, Twist RefSeq Exome).

library_selection.description: The method used to select for or against, enrich, or screen the material being sequenced (e.g., random, PCA, cDNA).

library_type.description: Describe the level of omics analysis (e.g., metagenome, transcriptome)

primer.description: The type of primer used for reverse transcription (e.g., oligo-dT or random).

rnaseq_strandedness.description: The strandedness of the library, whether reads come from both strands of the cDNA or only from the first (antisense) or the second (sense) strand.

target_regions.description: Subset of genes or specific regions of the genome, which are most likely to be involved in the phenotype under study.

LibraryPreparationProtocol.title: LibraryPreparationProtocol

LibraryPreparationRNASeqStrandednessEnum.description: Permitted values for library preparation RNASeq strandedness
LibraryPreparationRNASeqStrandednessEnum.title: LibraryPreparationRNASeqStrandednessEnum

MutantOrWildtypeEnum.description: Enum to capture whether a condition corresponds to a mutant or a wildtype.
MutantOrWildtypeEnum.title: MutantOrWildtypeEnum

PhenotypicFeaturesEnum.description: An enum describing permissible phenotype descriptors
PhenotypicFeaturesEnum.title: PhenotypicFeaturesEnum

Publication.description: A Publication represents an article that is published. The minimum expectation is that the publication has a valid DOI.

abstract.description: The study abstract that describes the goals. Can also hold abstract from a Publication related to this Study.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

study.description: The Study entity associated with this Publication.

xref.description: One or more cross-references for this Publication.

year.description: The year in which the paper was published.

Publication.title: Publication

Sample.description: A Sample is a limited quantity of something to be used for testing, analysis, inspection, investigation, demonstration, or trial use.  It is prepared from a Biospecimen.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

attributes.description: Key/value pairs corresponding to an entity.

biospecimen.description: The Biospecimen which this Sample was prepared from.

condition.description: The Condition that applies to this Sample. The Condition is used to link comparable Samples (e.g., healthy Samples, wildtype Samples).

description.description: A concise description about the Sample source, the collection method, and the protocol which was followed to process this Sample.

isolation.description: Method or device employed for collecting/isolating this Sample.

name.description: A descriptive name of this Sample (e.g., GHGAS_Blood_Sample1 or GHGAS_PBMC_RNAseq_S1). This property must not include any personally identifiable data.

storage.description: Methods by which this Sample is stored.

xref.description: One or more cross-references for this Sample (e.g., this Sample may have an EBI BioSamples accession ID).

Sample.title: Sample

SampleBarcodeReadEnum.description: Permitted values for sample barcode read
SampleBarcodeReadEnum.title: SampleBarcodeReadEnum

SampleFile.description: A Sample File is a File that is associated with a Sample.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

checksum_type.description: The type of algorithm used to generate the checksum of the File.

dataset.description: The Dataset associated with this File.

format.description: The format of the File (e.g., BAM, SAM, CRAM, BAI).

forward_or_reverse.description: Denotes whether a submitted FASTQ file contains forward (R1) or reverse (R2) reads for paired-end sequencing.

sample.description: The Sample that is associated with this Sample File.

size.description: The size of the File in bytes.

SampleFile.title: SampleFile

SequencingExperiment.description: A Sequencing Experiment is an investigation that consists of a coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data with the goal of verifying, falsifying, or establishing the validity of a hypothesis.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

attributes.description: Key/value pairs corresponding to an entity.

description.description: A detailed description of this Sequencing Experiment.

library_preparation_protocol.description: The Library Preparation Protocol associated with this Sequencing Experiment.

sequencing_protocol.description: The Sequencing Protocol associated with this Sequencing Experiment.

title.description: The title for this Sequencing Experiment (e.g., GHGAE_PBMC_RNAseq).

type.description: The type of this Sequencing Experiment.

SequencingExperiment.title: SequencingExperiment

SequencingProcess.description: The Sequencing Process captures the technical parameters that were used to produce sequencing output from the Sample. It links the Sample to sequencing output.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

attributes.description: Key/value pairs corresponding to an entity.

description.description: A short description of this Sequencing Process.

index_sequence.description: A unique nucleotide sequence that is added to a sample during library preparation to serve as a unique identifier for the Sample.

name.description: A short name identifying this Sequencing Process.

sample.description: The Sample associated with this Sequencing Process.

sequencing_experiment.description: The Sequencing Experiment associated with this Sequencing Process.

sequencing_lane_id.description: The identifier of a sequencing lane.

sequencing_machine_id.description: The identifier of a sequencing machine.

sequencing_run_id.description: The identifier of a sequencing run.

SequencingProcess.title: SequencingProcess

SequencingProcessFile.description: A Sequencing Process File is a File that is associated with a Sequencing Process.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

checksum_type.description: The type of algorithm used to generate the checksum of the File.

dataset.description: The Dataset associated with this File.

format.description: The format of the File (e.g., BAM, SAM, CRAM, BAI).

forward_or_reverse.description: Denotes whether a submitted FASTQ file contains forward (R1) or reverse (R2) reads for paired-end sequencing.

sequencing_process.description: The Sequencing Process associated with this Sequencing Process File.

size.description: The size of the File in bytes.

SequencingProcessFile.title: SequencingProcessFile

SequencingProtocol.description: The Sequencing Protocol captures information about parameters and metadata associated with a Sequencing Experiment.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

attributes.description: One or more attributes that further characterize this Sequencing Protocol.

cell_barcode_offset.description: The offset in sequence of the cell identifying barcode (e.g., 0).

cell_barcode_read.description: The type of read that contains the cell barcode (e.g., index1, index2, read1, read2).

cell_barcode_size.description: The size of the cell identifying barcode (e.g., 16).

description.description: A description summarizing the Sequencing Protocol.

flow_cell_type.description: Type of flow cell used (e.g., S4, S2 for NovaSeq; PromethION, Flongle for Nanopore).

instrument_model.description: The name and model of the technology platform used to perform sequencing.

name.description: A short name identifying this Sequencing Protocol.

sample_barcode_read.description: The type of read that contains the sample barcode (e.g., index1, index2, read1, read2).

sequencing_read_length.description: Length of sequencing reads (e.g., long or short or actual number of the read length).

target_coverage.description: Mean coverage for whole genome sequencing, or mean target coverage for whole exome and targeted sequencing, (i.e. the number of times a particular locus was sequenced).

type.description: Type of the Sequencing Protocol (e.g., mRNA-seq, Whole exome long-read sequencing).

umi_barcode_offset.description: The offset in sequence of the UMI identifying barcode (e.g., 16).

umi_barcode_read.description: The type of read that contains the UMI barcode (e.g., index1, index2, read1, read2).

umi_barcode_size.description: The size of the UMI identifying barcode (e.g., 10).

SequencingProtocol.title: SequencingProtocol

StorageEnum.description: Enum to capture how a Sample or Biospecimen was stored.
StorageEnum.title: StorageEnum

Study.description: A Study is an experimental investigation of a particular phenomenon. It involves a detailed examination and analysis of a subject to learn more about the phenomenon being studied.

affiliations.description: The affiliations associated with this Study.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

attributes.description: One or more attributes that further characterize this Study.

description.description: A detailed description (abstract) that describes the goals of this Study.

title.description: A comprehensive title for this Study.

type.description: The type of this Study (e.g., Cancer Genomics, Epigenetics, Exome Sequencing).

Study.title: Study

StudyFile.description: A Study File is a File that is associated with a Study.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

checksum_type.description: The type of algorithm used to generate the checksum of the File.

dataset.description: The Dataset associated with this File.

format.description: The format of the File (e.g., BAM, SAM, CRAM, BAI).

forward_or_reverse.description: Denotes whether a submitted FASTQ file contains forward (R1) or reverse (R2) reads for paired-end sequencing.

size.description: The size of the File in bytes.

study.description: The Study that is associated with this Study File.

StudyFile.title: StudyFile

StudyTypeEnum.description: Enum to capture the type of a study.
StudyTypeEnum.title: StudyTypeEnum

Submission.description: A grouping entity that represents information about one or more entities. A submission can be considered as a set of inter-related (and inter-connected) entities that represent a data submission to GHGA.

analyses.description: One or more Analysis entities associated with this Submission.

analysis_process_output_files.description: The Analysis Process Output Files that are part of this Submission.

analysis_processes.description: The Analysis Processes that are part of this Submission.

biospecimens.description: One or more Biospecimen entities associated with this Submission.

conditions.description: One or more Condition entities associated with this Submission.

data_access_committees.description: The Data Access Committees that apply to the Data Access Policies in this Submission.

data_access_policies.description: The Data Access Policies that apply to the Datasets in this Submission.

datasets.description: One or more Dataset entities that are part of this Submission.

individuals.description: One or more Individual entities associated with this Submission.

library_preparation_protocols.description: One or more Library Preparation Protocol entities associated with this Submission.

publications.description: One or more Publication entities associated with this Submission.

sample_files.description: The Sample Files that are part of this submission.

samples.description: One or more Sample entities associated with this Submission.

sequencing_experiments.description: One or more Sequencing Experiment entities associated with this Submission.

sequencing_process_files.description: The Sequencing Process Files that are part of this Submission.

sequencing_processes.description: The Sequencing Processes that are part of this Submission.

sequencing_protocols.description: One or more Sequencing Protocol entities associated with this Submission.

studies.description: Study entities associated with this Submission.

study_files.description: The Study Files that are part of this Submission.

trios.description: One or more Trio entities associated with this Submission.

Submission.title: Submission

TissueEnum.description: A tissue as described in the BRENDA ontology.
TissueEnum.title: TissueEnum

Trio.description: A Trio is a study design in which the genetic information of three individuals within a family unit is analyzed. It consists of a child and their biological parents.

alias.description: The alias for an entity at the time of submission.

Trio.title: Trio

VitalStatusEnum.description: Enum to capture the vital status of an individual.
VitalStatusEnum.title: VitalStatusEnum

analyses.description: One or more Analysis entities associated with this Submission.

analysis_process_output_files.description: The Analysis Process Output Files that are part of this Submission.

analysis_processes.description: The Analysis Processes that are part of this Submission.

biospecimens.description: One or more Biospecimen entities associated with this Submission.

conditions.description: One or more Condition entities associated with this Submission.

data_access_committees.description: The Data Access Committees that apply to the Data Access Policies in this Submission.

data_access_policies.description: The Data Access Policies that apply to the Datasets in this Submission.

datasets.description: One or more Dataset entities that are part of this Submission.

individuals.description: One or more Individual entities associated with this Submission.

library_preparation_protocols.description: One or more Library Preparation Protocol entities associated with this Submission.

publications.description: One or more Publication entities associated with this Submission.

sample_files.description: The Sample Files that are part of this submission.

samples.description: One or more Sample entities associated with this Submission.

sequencing_experiments.description: One or more Sequencing Experiment entities associated with this Submission.

sequencing_process_files.description: The Sequencing Process Files that are part of this Submission.

sequencing_processes.description: The Sequencing Processes that are part of this Submission.

sequencing_protocols.description: One or more Sequencing Protocol entities associated with this Submission.

studies.description: Study entities associated with this Submission.

study_files.description: The Study Files that are part of this Submission.

trios.description: One or more Trio entities associated with this Submission.
